meanings.definition: To glow again or shine brightly
meanings.sent1: After the storm passed, the sun started reglowing in the sky.
meanings.sent2: The fireflies were reglowing in the dark forest, lighting up the night.
meanings.sent3: The old lamp seemed to be reglowing with a mischievous twinkle.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was so radiant, it made the room feel like it was reglowing with happiness.
meanings.sent5: The stars above were reglowing like tiny diamonds in the velvet sky.

meanings.definition: The act of glowing again or shining brightly
meanings.sent1: The reglowing of the embers in the fireplace brought warmth to the room.
meanings.sent2: The reglowing of the city lights at night created a beautiful sight.
meanings.sent3: The reglowing of the neon sign made it look like a dancing rainbow.
meanings.sent4: The reglowing of the moon on the water made the lake shimmer like silver.
meanings.sent5: The reglowing of the fireflies in the garden made it feel like a magical wonderland.
